SEARCH
Package io.github.jy95.fds.common.functions

Interface QuantityToString<C extends FDSConfig,Q>

Type Parameters:
C - The type of configuration object extending FDSConfig.
Q - The type of quantity object to be converted.
All Known Implementing Classes:
QuantityToStringR4, QuantityToStringR5
public interface QuantityToString<C extends FDSConfig,Q>
Interface for converting quantity objects to human-readable strings.
Author:
jy95

    List of time-related systems.

    UNITS_OF_TIME_SYSTEM
    System URI for units of time in FHIR.

  • Method Details

    • convert

      default CompletableFuture<String> convert(ResourceBundle bundle, C config, Q quantity)
      Converts a quantity object to a human-readable string asynchronously.
      Parameters:
      bundle - The resource bundle for localization.
      config - The configuration object for additional logic.
      quantity - The quantity object to convert.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that resolves to the human-readable string.

    • hasUnit

      boolean hasUnit(Q quantity)
      Determines if a quantity has a unit.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity object.
      Returns:
      True if the quantity has a unit, false otherwise.

    • getValue

      BigDecimal getValue(Q quantity)
      Retrieves the numeric value of the quantity.
      Parameters:
      quantity - The quantity object.
      Returns:
      The numeric value of the quantity.

    • enhancedFromUnitToString

      CompletableFuture<String> enhancedFromUnitToString(C config, Q quantity)
      Provides enhanced logic for converting units to a human-readable string.
      Parameters:
      config - The configuration object for additional logic.
      quantity - The quantity object.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that resolves to the human-readable string for the unit.

    • comparatorToString

      CompletableFuture<String> comparatorToString(ResourceBundle bundle, C config, Q quantity)
      Converts the comparator of a quantity to a human-readable string.
      Parameters:
      bundle - The resource bundle for localization.
      config - The configuration object for additional logic.
      quantity - The quantity object.
      Returns:
      A CompletableFuture that resolves to the human-readable string for the comparator.
